long_description: The Inova Microlight STS keychain flashlight introduces Swipe to Shine touch technology that lets you turn the light on with a simple swipe of the thumb rather than a traditional switch or button. Turning the light on is fast and easy-simply swipe your thumb right-to-left across the casing; turn the light off at any time with a quick left-to-right swipe. Swiping right-to-left also switches between high, low and flash modes; holding your thumb in the swipe zone enters variable dim, allowing you to choose the level of light. High, variable dim, low and flash modes allow you to use the light for everything from reading maps to finding keyholes or sending alert signals. Single bright white LED outputs 16 lumens on high and 2 lumens on low. Included S-biner stainless-steel, double-gated carabiner lets you clip the light to keychains, belt loops, zipper pulls and pack straps so it's always close by. Inova Microlight STS keychain light is powered by 2 replaceable CR2032 lithium batteries (included); batteries last for 9 hrs. in high mode and 64 hrs. in low mode.
short_description: The Inova Microlight STS keychain flashlight introduces Swipe to Shine touch technology that lets you turn the light on with a simple swipe of the thumb rather than a traditional switch or button.
